leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 工程仿真-FEA/多物理场求解生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 建模→求解→后处理→反问题→验证

queries: [WEB] method of manufactured solutions python github
[WEB] cfd verification and validation cases github
[WEB] finite element analysis benchmark problems github
[WEB] physics informed neural network benchmarks github

tools.name: Rowdy Activation Functions
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive activation functions library for Deep Kronecker Neural Networks in PDE solving
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Rowdy activation functions designed to inject sinusoidal fluctuations, helping optimizers exploit search spaces better in Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and other deep learning tasks.

tools.name: CEED Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: High-order finite element benchmarks for exascale computing
tools.detailed_description: A suite of benchmarks designed to test and evaluate the performance of high-order finite element algorithms on modern hardware architectures, developed by the Center for Efficient Exascale Discretizations (CEED).

tools.name: StiffNet Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for learning stiff PDE problems using physics-informed machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite specifically designed to evaluate the performance of Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) and other scientific machine learning models on stiff differential equations.

tools.name: PyFREC
tools.one_line_profile: Excitation energy transfer modeling software
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for modeling excitation energy transfer (EET) in molecular systems, useful for physical chemistry and biophysics simulations.

tools.name: SPDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for learning regular and singular Stochastic PDEs
tools.detailed_description: An extensive benchmark dataset and framework for evaluating machine learning models on solving Stochastic Partial Differential Equations (SPDEs), covering both regular and singular cases.

tools.name: opfgym
tools.one_line_profile: Gymnasium-compatible RL environment for Optimal Power Flow problems
tools.detailed_description: A framework providing reinforcement learning environments for solving Optimal Power Flow (OPF) problems in power systems, including standard benchmarks for comparable research.

tools.name: CLT-material-properties
tools.one_line_profile: Calculator for composite laminate material properties
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for calculating Young's modulus, stiffness matrix, strength, and failure criteria for composite laminate materials (CLT).

tools.name: pyfra
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for research productivity and experiment management
tools.detailed_description: A Python framework designed to streamline research workflows, allowing researchers to easily run experiments on remote servers, manage data, and parallelize tasks.

tools.name: BLOCKING
tools.one_line_profile: Convergence analysis tools for Molecular Dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for assessing the convergence of Molecular Dynamics (MD) simulations through error analysis of calculated ensemble averages and free energies.

tools.name: Mamo
tools.one_line_profile: Mathematical Modeling Benchmark with Solvers
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed to evaluate the mathematical modeling capabilities of AI models, including problem formulation and solver integration.

tools.name: PyFrac
tools.one_line_profile: Planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based solver for simulating planar 3D hydraulic fracture growth, developed by the Geo-Energy Laboratory at EPFL.

tools.name: AsterReader.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia reader for Code Aster mesh and result files
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for reading binary mesh and result files from Code Aster, facilitating the verification of JuliaFEM calculations against Code Aster solutions.

tools.name: SolverBenchmark.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking tools for numerical solvers in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package providing utilities to benchmark and compare the performance of numerical optimization solvers.

tools.name: OasisMove
tools.one_line_profile: Verified FEniCS-based CFD solver for moving domains
tools.detailed_description: A Python/FEniCS-based Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) solver specifically designed and validated for problems involving moving domains.

tools.name: MolPuzzle
tools.one_line_profile: Multimodal benchmark for molecular structure elucidation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed to evaluate the ability of Large Language Models (LLMs) to solve molecular puzzles and elucidate molecular structures.

tools.name: mis-benchmark-framework
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for maximum independent set solvers
tools.detailed_description: A framework for benchmarking and evaluating solvers for the Maximum Independent Set (MIS) problem, a classic combinatorial optimization problem.

tools.name: SimpleNSSolver
tools.one_line_profile: Massively-parallelized Navier-Stokes solver
tools.detailed_description: A well-documented, validated, and massively-parallelized solver for the Navier-Stokes equations, suitable for high-performance CFD simulations.

tools.name: neurodiffeq
tools.one_line_profile: Library for solving differential equations using neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based library for solving ordinary and partial differential equations (ODEs/PDEs) using neural networks, facilitating research in scientific machine learning.

tools.name: CFD and Blood Damage Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: FDA-sponsored benchmark data for CFD and blood damage validation
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing benchmark data for Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) and blood damage validation studies, sponsored by the U.S. FDA to support medical device evaluation.

tools.name: ik_benchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Inverse Kinematics solver benchmarking utilities
tools.detailed_description: Utilities for benchmarking Inverse Kinematics (IK) solvers within the MoveIt 2 robotics framework, allowing for performance comparison of different solver algorithms.

tools.name: Formal Problem Solving Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and framework for formal problem-solving beyond theorem proving
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the paper 'Beyond Theorem Proving: Formulation, Framework and Benchmark for Formal Problem-Solving', providing a benchmark environment for evaluating AI agents on formal mathematical and logic problems.

tools.name: PyFR
tools.one_line_profile: High-order flux reconstruction solver for unsteady advection-diffusion problems
tools.detailed_description: PyFR is an open-source Python based framework for solving advection-diffusion type problems on streaming architectures using the Flux Reconstruction approach of Huynh. It is designed for high-performance CFD simulations.

tools.name: mcu-solver-benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for optimization solvers on microcontrollers
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite for evaluating the performance of various solvers (like TinyMPC) on microcontroller units (MCUs), focusing on embedded control applications.

tools.name: Sudoku-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for creative AI problem solving using Sudoku variants
tools.detailed_description: An AI benchmark designed to evaluate creative, human-like problem-solving capabilities of models using various Sudoku puzzles and their variants.

tools.name: SciMLBenchmarks.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmarks for scientific machine learning and differential equation solvers
tools.detailed_description: A massive collection of benchmarks for the SciML ecosystem, covering differential equation solvers, physics-informed machine learning, and other scientific computing tasks across Julia, Python, and other languages.

tools.name: ContactBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for contact models and solvers in robotics simulators
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate and compare different contact models and solvers used in robotics simulations, assessing their accuracy and performance.

tools.name: proxqp_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for Quadratic Programming (QP) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite comparing the ProxQP solver against other standard QP solvers like OSQP, GUROBI, MOSEK, and qpOASES.

tools.name: TRIQS Benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Impurity solver benchmarks for condensed-matter physics
tools.detailed_description: A set of benchmarks for impurity solvers used in the study of strongly correlated electron systems, maintained by the TRIQS collaboration.

tools.name: pyFrame3DD
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Frame3DD structural analysis software
tools.detailed_description: Python interface for Frame3DD, a static and dynamic structural analysis software for 2D and 3D frames and trusses, developed within the WISDEM ecosystem.

tools.name: FlashAdventure
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for GUI agents solving full story arcs in adventure games
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating the capabilities of GUI-based AI agents in solving complex, long-horizon tasks within adventure game environments.

tools.name: DLWP Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Deep Learning Weather Prediction models
tools.detailed_description: Code and framework for comparing and contrasting deep learning weather prediction backbones on Navier-Stokes and atmospheric dynamics problems.

tools.name: adaptrapezoid_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for adaptive trapezoid numeric integration algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A project benchmarking various programming languages for their suitability in scientific computing, specifically using the adaptive trapezoid numeric integration algorithm.

tools.name: benchmark_bilevel
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for bi-level optimization solvers
tools.detailed_description: A collaborative benchmark for evaluating the performance of various bi-level optimization solvers and algorithms.

tools.name: LAP-solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Linear Assignment Problem (LAP) solvers
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark comparing the performance of different solvers for the Linear Assignment Problem, a fundamental combinatorial optimization problem.

tools.name: pyfrost
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for Bifrost's compacted colored de Bruijn Graph
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for the Bifrost C++ library, enabling the construction and analysis of compacted colored de Bruijn graphs for genomic data processing.

tools.name: ConvolutionalNeuralOperator
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional Neural Operators for robust PDE learning
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of Convolutional Neural Operators (CNO), a deep learning architecture designed for accurate and robust learning of partial differential equations.

tools.name: yet-another-applied-llm-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating LLMs on applied technical questions
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the performance of Large Language Models on practical, applied technical questions and problem-solving tasks.

tools.name: Nektar++ (Mirror)
tools.one_line_profile: Spectral/hp element framework for solving PDEs
tools.detailed_description: An open-source software framework designed to support the development of high-performance scalable solvers for partial differential equations using the spectral/hp element method.

tools.name: AL4PDE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Active Learning methods in Neural PDE Solvers
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to evaluate active learning strategies for physics-informed neural networks and other neural PDE solvers.

tools.name: PARTNR-Planner
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Large Planning Models in Human-Robot Collaboration
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating Large Planning Models (LPMs) on human-robot collaboration tasks within the Habitat simulator environment.

tools.name: PINNacle
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmark for Physics-Informed Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A large-scale benchmark dataset and evaluation suite for Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs) across various PDE problems.

tools.name: DeepXDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scientific machine learning and physics-informed learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for solving differential equations (ODEs, PDEs, integro-differential equations) using physics-informed neural networks (PINNs) and other scientific machine learning methods.

tools.name: MASA
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Method of Manufactured Solutions (MMS) in scientific computing
tools.detailed_description: MASA (Manufactured Analytical Solution Abstraction) is a library designed to verify the accuracy of numerical solvers for partial differential equations (PDEs) using the Method of Manufactured Solutions. It provides a repository of exact solutions for code verification in CFD and FEA.

tools.name: PINNs
tools.one_line_profile: Reference implementation of Physics Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
tools.detailed_description: This repository serves as the foundational reference and benchmark implementation for Physics Informed Deep Learning. It provides data-driven solutions and discovery methods for nonlinear partial differential equations, widely used as a baseline in the SciML community.

tools.name: FEA-Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating code generation in Finite Element Analysis
tools.detailed_description: FEA-Bench is a benchmark suite designed to evaluate the capability of Large Language Models (LLMs) in generating repository-level code for Finite Element Analysis (FEA) feature implementation, bridging AI and scientific software engineering.

tools.name: pyFreeFem
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the FreeFem++ finite element solver
tools.detailed_description: pyFreeFem provides a Python interface to FreeFem++, a popular partial differential equation solver. It allows researchers to integrate FreeFem++ simulations into Python-based scientific workflows and data analysis pipelines.

tools.name: solver-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark of (MI)LP solvers on energy modelling problems
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the performance of various Mixed-Integer Linear Programming (MILP) solvers specifically on energy system modeling problems, aiding in solver selection for energy transition research.

tools.name: AlgoTune
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset of math and physics problems for evaluating AI models
tools.detailed_description: AlgoTune is a benchmark suite comprising math, physics, and computer science problems designed to evaluate the algorithmic reasoning and code generation capabilities of AI models in scientific contexts.

tools.name: osqp_benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for the OSQP quadratic programming solver
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains benchmarks comparing the OSQP solver against other leading solvers (GUROBI, MOSEK, ECOS, qpOASES) for quadratic programming problems, which are fundamental in engineering control and physics simulation.

tools.name: PDEBench
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive benchmark suite for Scientific Machine Learning (PDEs)
tools.detailed_description: PDEBench provides a comprehensive set of Partial Differential Equation (PDE) benchmarks to evaluate scientific machine learning models. It covers various physical phenomena including fluid dynamics, diffusion, and wave propagation.

tools.name: mpc_qpbenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Model Predictive Control test set to benchmark QP solvers
tools.detailed_description: A specialized benchmark suite for evaluating Quadratic Programming (QP) solvers specifically on Model Predictive Control (MPC) problems, which are critical in robotics and process engineering.

tools.name: qpbenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for quadratic programming solvers in Python
tools.detailed_description: A standard benchmarking framework to compare the performance, accuracy, and robustness of various Quadratic Programming solvers available in the Python ecosystem.

tools.name: DeepXDE-ZCS
tools.one_line_profile: ZCS-integrated version of the DeepXDE library for solving differential equations
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the DeepXDE library incorporating ZCS (Zero-Shot Coordination or specific integration strategies) for physics-informed machine learning tasks, specifically designed for solving partial differential equations (PDEs) in scientific computing contexts.

tools.name: SciML Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) methods
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking suite developed by STFC-SciML to evaluate the performance of AI methods applied to scientific problems, providing standardized datasets and metrics for AI for Science research.

tools.name: SU2 V&V
tools.one_line_profile: Verification and validation suite for the SU2 CFD solver
tools.detailed_description: The official verification and validation (V&V) suite for the SU2 open-source CFD code, containing test cases, manufactured solutions, and benchmarks to ensure solver accuracy and reliability.

tools.name: blastfoam
tools.one_line_profile: CFD solver for high-explosive detonation and air blast simulations
tools.detailed_description: A specialized CFD solver based on OpenFOAM for simulating multi-component compressible flow, specifically targeting high-explosive detonation, explosive safety, and air blast scenarios.

tools.name: VOF-DEM-FDM-Solver
tools.one_line_profile: Resolved CFD-DEM solver for multiphase flow with deformable solids
tools.detailed_description: An extension to OpenFOAM/CFDEM libraries implementing a resolved Immersed Boundary/Fictitious Domain (IB/FDM) coupled with Volume of Fluid (VOF) method for simulating multiphase flows with deformable granular solids.

tools.name: VOF-DEM-Solvers
tools.one_line_profile: Unresolved CFD-DEM VOF solvers for multiphase fluid-particle injection
tools.detailed_description: A set of unresolved CFD-DEM VOF solvers (PISO/PIMPLE algorithms) within the CFDEMproject framework, designed for simulating multiphase fluid-particle injection and displacement processes.

tools.name: ApeBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for autoregressive neural emulation of PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating autoregressive neural networks in emulating Partial Differential Equations (PDEs), featuring over 46 PDEs in 1D, 2D, and 3D, with support for differentiable physics and unrolled training metrics.

tools.name: Autoreg PDE Diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for autoregressive conditional diffusion models in turbulent flow
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for applying autoregressive conditional diffusion models to turbulent flow simulations, providing implementations and evaluation metrics for probabilistic PDE solving.

tools.name: Benchmark SpTRSM CSC
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for parallel sparse triangular solves (SpTRSM)
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for evaluating fast synchronization-free algorithms for Parallel Sparse Triangular Solves with Multiple Right-Hand Sides (SpTRSM), critical for high-performance scientific computing solvers.

tools.name: Benchmark SpTRSV CSC
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for parallel sparse triangular solves (SpTRSV)
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking implementation for synchronization-free algorithms for Parallel Sparse Triangular Solves (SpTRSV), used to optimize numerical kernels in scientific simulations.

tools.name: ControlGym
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale control environments for benchmarking RL algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking platform providing large-scale control environments to evaluate Reinforcement Learning algorithms, bridging the gap between control theory and modern AI methods.

tools.name: MultiPhysics Bench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for Scientific Machine Learning in multiphysics PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated benchmarking suite for investigating and evaluating Scientific Machine Learning (SciML) approaches for solving complex multiphysics Partial Differential Equations.

tools.name: AI4XDE
tools.one_line_profile: Library of cases and algorithms for solving differential equations with AI
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a collection of cases and algorithms for solving various differential equations (XDEs) using Artificial Intelligence methods, facilitating research in AI-driven scientific computing.

tools.name: G4SATBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for SAT solving with Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate and advance Boolean Satisfiability (SAT) solving using Graph Neural Networks (GNNs), providing datasets and baselines for neuro-symbolic computation research.
